body.p: Picked Gentoo to play for and won Robot Fight Night, so $400 US was donated to the Gentoo Foundation to pay for Gentoo Development and Services, etc.
Vilhelm I believe made the suggestion to the others to play for Gentoo and they accepted.

p.b: Hi Vilhelm, is that about right?

body.p: That's absolutely correct. We got to choose an open source project to fight for and I pitched Gentoo to my friends who gladly accepted.

p.b: If you would like to hear more from Vilhelm and his use of Gentoo, check out the complete interview.
